definition: to vaporize/evaporation/carburetion/氣|气[qi4] transformation in TCM (i.e. transformation of yin yang vital breath)/unvoicing of voiced consonant
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi
to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]
(TCM) to rectify 氣|气[qi4] and transform phlegm
bladder 氣|气[qi4] transformation in TCM

sentences.english: The feasibility of up-draft gasifier which exhausts in its middle in fixed beds is verified.
sentences.chinese: 證明上吸式中間排氣固定牀氣化爐的可行性。

sentences.english: As the fireball cools, the vaporized materials in it condense to form a cloud of solid particles.
sentences.chinese: 當火球冷卻時，內部的氣化物質壓縮形成固態微粒雲。

sentences.english: I want to have an all-electric vehicle in my lifetime.
sentences.chinese: 我想要在我的生活中有一個全電氣化的車。

sentences.english: In this paper four gasifiers were evaluated by this method.
sentences.chinese: 文中用這一方法評價了四種煤氣化爐。

sentences.english: The system structure of coke carried heat partial gasification combined cycle presented by the Department of Thermal Engineering of Tsinghua University is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了焦載熱部分氣化燃煤聯合循環技術的系統結構。

sentences.english: If the water pressure is not enough, it may lead to inductor coil gasifying and emitting heat.
sentences.chinese: 如果水壓不夠，就會造成感應器線圈氣化，發熱。

sentences.english: Discussion on the superiority in development of lignite gasification in Dayan Coal Industry Corp.
sentences.chinese: 大雁煤業公司發展褐煤氣化的優勢探討。

sentences.english: The mechanism of utilizing negative activators to passivate gasification reaction of coke is analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 分析和研究了利用負催化劑鈍化焦炭氣化反應的機理。

sentences.english: The development of large ammonia plants using coal as raw material depends largely on the progress of the "second generation" coal gasification processes.
sentences.chinese: 煤原料大型氨廠的發展取決於開發第二代煤氣化工藝。

sentences.english: The relationship of gasification reactivity and pore specific surface area of petroleum coke is studied.
sentences.chinese: 實驗研究了石油焦氣化反應活性和孔比表面積的關係。

sentences.english: What weird behaviour can gases display near absolute zero?
sentences.chinese: 什麼樣的希奇古怪的行爲可以氣化顯示接近絕對零度？

sentences.english: Check whether the bars is blocked.
sentences.chinese: 氣化爐內爐篦子是否堵塞。

sentences.english: Wet biomass can be efficiently gasified in supercritical water to produce a hydrogen rich fuel gas.
sentences.chinese: 溼生物質可以在超臨界水中有效地氣化生成富氫氣體。

sentences.english: Gasification liberates this in its elemental form, making it easy to recover.
sentences.chinese: 氣化讓硫釋放成其基本形式，讓它更容易還原。

sentences.english: In a split second the melon is vapourised.
Some have been electrified, but this is not common.
sentences.chinese: 有些房子已電氣化了，但是這種房子還不多見。

definition: the three energies of Chinese medicine: 精[jing1], 氣|气[qi4], and 神[shen2]
"eight principles," a method of giving a general description and syndrome differentiation (TCM)
five viscera of TCM, namely: heart 心[xin1], liver 肝[gan1], spleen 脾[pi2], lungs 肺[fei4] and kidneys 腎|肾[shen4]
